projects.title: Wiresnitch
projects.shortDescription: Real-time network security monitoring system for Linux environments
projects.fullDescription: A comprehensive network traffic monitoring solution featuring interactive dashboards, packet inspection, anomaly detection, and automated log analysis with dockerized CI/CD deployment.

features.title: Real-time Monitoring
features.description: Live packet capture and analysis with interactive dashboard

features.title: Anomaly Detection
features.description: Machine learning-based detection of suspicious network activity

projects.title: CipherYou
projects.shortDescription: Cross-platform file encryption tool with AES-256 security
projects.fullDescription: A secure file encryption application featuring AES-256 encryption, PBKDF2 key derivation, password protection, and intuitive PyQt5 interface.

features.title: Military-Grade Encryption
features.description: AES-256 encryption with PBKDF2 key derivation

features.title: Secure File Deletion
features.description: Overwrite original files to prevent recovery

projects.title: CyHelp
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered content safety detection system - Global CyberPeace Challenge Winner
projects.fullDescription: An intelligent content moderation system using computer vision and NLP to detect harmful content in real-time, featuring automated reporting and user verification.

features.title: Real-time Detection
features.description: Instant analysis of images and text content
